name: Abandoned Cruise Mystery
description:
Description: The ship was abandoned a long time ago, you play as a ghost who was trapped inside. Try find all the hidden objects and solve the puzzles to escape. Good Luck and have fun.

Game Page: http://www.freeroomescape.com/abandoned-cruise-mystery/

Game Pixel Size: 800x500

Game Image: http://www.freeroomescape.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/Abandoned-Cruise-Mystery-588x300.jpg

Game File: http://www.freeroomescape.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/abandoned-cruise-mystery-1.swf

Walkthrough: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZzG-gRdoiaA
